description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to build an adequate, efficient, safe and sustainable road network linking the Republic of Azerbaijan domestically and internationally. The Project shall consist of the following: i) construction of approximately 39.3 km of a new four-lane category I expressway between km 22.1 to km. 61.4 (the Project Road) on the Masalli-Astana highway, comprising: Section B of the Project Road from km 22.1 to km. 45.1 and Section C of the Project Road from km 45.1 to km 61.4; and ii) project management support and consulting services for construction supervision, financial audit, social and environmental assessments, and institutional capacity development.

participating-org.narrative: State Agency of Azerbaijan Automobile Roads

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable southern road corridor from Baku.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
5% increase in passenger traffic (Baseline: 10,892 million passenger-km in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable southern road corridor from Baku.

title.narrative: 5% reduction in road traffic accidents (Baseline: 3,179 in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable southern road corridor from Baku.

title.narrative: Increased funding for road maintenance to at least $150 million (Baseline: $55 million in 2006).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable southern road corridor from Baku.

title.narrative: By 2015: 20% increase in freight traffic (Baseline: 7,536 million ton-km in 2005).

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable southern road corridor from Baku.
